item.title: Any2Policy: Learning Visuomotor Policy with Any-Modality
item.description: Any2Policy: a unified multi-modal system enabling robots to perform tasks using diverse instruction and observation modalities (text, image, audio, video, point cloud).

item.title: EDT: An Efficient Diffusion Transformer Framework Inspired by Human-like Sketching
item.description: The Efficient Diffusion Transformer (EDT) framework significantly speeds up and improves image generation by leveraging a lightweight architecture, human-like sketching-inspired Attention Modulation M…
